Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced PARK2 protein expression by 45% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C187Y.
Reduced PARK2 protein expression by 35% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C209Y.
Reduced PARK2 protein expression by 50% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C282Y.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PARK2 protein expression greater than 70% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: PARK2 protein expression less than 50% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells co-transfected with PARK2 variants and reporter plasmids were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased reporter activity by 200% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C187Y.
Increased reporter activity by 180% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C209Y.
Increased reporter activity by 190% in HEK293 cells expressing p.C282Y.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Reporter activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reporter activity exceeding 150% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing PARK2 variants were imaged using confocal microscopy.

Readout description.Result Description: Altered mitochondrial morphology and increased fragmentation in HEK293 cells expressing p.C187Y.
Altered mitochondrial morphology and increased fragmentation in HEK293 cells expressing p.C209Y.
Altered mitochondrial morphology and increased fragmentation in HEK293 cells expressing p.C282Y.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was imaged in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ImageJ was used for quantification and statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial morphology within 20% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial fragmentation exceeding 50% of wild-type levels.
